detail.title: Quad Services Business Development System
detail.description:
● Single Page Application (SPA) based on AngularJS and Bootstrap.
● Restful API based on ASP.NET WEB API 2, Entity Framework 6, Repository pattern and Owin OAuth.
● Fully responsive interface and compatible with all different devices.
● Implement Authentication with Microsoft Active Directory and AngularJS Routing.
● AngularJS unit test with Jasmine and Karma.
● Backend Unit testing with Moq and MSTest.

detail.title: Quad Services Equipment Management System
detail.description:
● Single Page Application (SPA) based on AngularJS and Bootstrap.
● Restful API based on ASP.NET WEB API 2 and Entity Framework 6.
● Fully responsive interface and compatible with all different devices.

detail.title: Quad Services Job Process System
detail.description:
● Transferred from company existing legacy systems.
● Backend based on ASP.NET MVC 4 and Enity Framework 6.
● Frontend based on Bootstrap, MentroUI to create responsive interfaces which are compatible with all tablet devices.
● Implement report system with Crystal report and Sharepoint.
● Implement authentication with Microsoft Active Directory and MVC routing.
